Instrument_Host.name: IRAS
Instrument_Host.description: The IRAS satellite had two primary components: the spacecraft and the telescope system. The telescope system, located at the upper part of the satellite, included a focal plane assembly with survey detectors, visible star sensors for position reconstruction, a Low Resolution Spectrometer (LRS), and a Chopped Photometric Channel (CPC).
